programme.title: Award-Winning Weddings
programme.desc: We're always looking for up-and-coming talent. This category is designed to recognize a fresh filmmaker on the scene who has nonetheless demonstrated exceptional filmmaking skills and pushed the creative envelope in our industry. This episode contains finalists from the 2024 Wedding Film Awards.

programme.title: Award-Winning Weddings
programme.desc: What's more enchanting than a themed wedding, where love and imagination unite? From whimsical Halloween affairs to epic Star Wars spectacles, and the mysteries of Masquerade to the enchantment of Alice in Wonderland – the possibilities are boundless, and so is the amusement. This episode contains finalists from the 2024 Wedding Film Awards.

programme.title: Award-Winning Weddings
programme.desc: An awe-inspiring venue creates a whole vibe that an astounding wedding can be built around. The Best Venue award goes to the video where the venue takes center stage and shines throughout. This episode contains finalists from the 2024 Wedding Film Awards.

programme.title: Award-Winning Weddings
programme.desc: No long-winded boring speeches or cookie cutter vows here! The Best Speech Or Vows award goes to the video that showcases a speech or vow that leave us in awe. Speeches can be emotional, hilarious, sweet and tear-inducing. Personalized vows can show us everything about a couple in a few well thought out sentences. The words and sentiment of an amazing speech or spectacular vows will last long after the walk down the aisle is over and the last glasses have been clinked. This episode contains finalists from the 2024 Wedding Film Awards.

programme.title: Award-Winning Weddings
programme.desc: South Asian weddings, often spanning multiple days, brim with family, tradition, and vibrant celebrations. Imbued with rich culture, these weddings manifest in diverse settings, from grand ballrooms to intimate backyards and luxurious destinations. The Best South Asian Wedding award recognizes the video that profoundly captivates us, both visually and emotionally. This episode contains finalists from the 2024 Wedding Film Awards.

programme.title: Award-Winning Weddings
programme.desc: Editing a film that captures viewers and distills a full video into a coherent narrative for social media is an art unto itself. The finalists in this category will deliver a viral-worth video for TikTok, Instagram, or other platforms. This episode contains finalists from the 2024 Wedding Film Awards.

programme.title: Award-Winning Weddings
programme.desc: Not to contradict Coco Chanel, but dress impeccably and they most certainly do remember the dress, tux, or shoes. This award recognizes the film that perfectly captures how fashion sets the tone for a wedding: from Bohemian to sharply tailored—and everything in between. This episode contains finalists from the 2024 Wedding Film Awards.

programme.title: Award-Winning Weddings
programme.desc: A great soundtrack is crucial to delivering a film that captures our emotions. These films employ music to take the content from great to exceptional through a transcendent audio journey using music to both set the mood and capture the spirit of the wedding celebration. This episode contains finalists from the 2024 Wedding Film Awards.

programme.title: Award-Winning Weddings
programme.desc: Featuring the work of the most elite wedding filmmakers from across the globe, Award-Winning Weddings features finalists from our annual Love Stories TV Wedding Film Awards.

programme.title: All-Star Weddings
programme.desc: Looking for unique wedding entertainment and inspo? We've rounded up some all-star wedding videos that’ll feature your favorite sports!
